Name: GTEC025 - Owner Agent Move Notification PDF
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","name":"LAOM_{reference}","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
{#PDF_Top_Logo}


Notifier Details
Are you the owner or managing agent? {whatIsYourRelatio}
{detailsLabel}
{#yourDetails/SF_Sum}

Property Details
Please provide details of the property where the move is occuring
Address {#PropDetAdd/addrTextArea}
Is this Property {willThePropertyBe}
@af:if({CSA/FS_Product} = 'Service')
Council Tax Number {CTNumber}
@endaf:if
Are there Tenants Moving Out? {TMoveOut}
@af:if({TMoveOut} = 'yes')
Who is Moving Out

{form_name}

Moving Out
Title {MovingOut/title}
First name {MovingOut/firstName}
Surname {MovingOut/surname}
Please provide details of where they are moving to / correspondence address (if known)

Only one forwarding address can be provided

Move To Address
Moving To {#MoveToAdd/addrTextArea}
When will the Tenancy End {CompletionTenancyDate}
Move out Date {moveOutDate}
Will any existing tenants remain living at the property: {ExistingRemain}
@af:if({ExistingRemain} = 'no')
What is happening to the property? {whatIsHappeningTo1}
@endaf:if
@af:if({whatIsHappeningTo1} = 'rented')
Will there be any new Tenants? {willThereBeAnyNe}
The property will be rented {willThePropertyBe_old}
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
@af:if({newRemaining} = 1)
Remaining or New Tenant Details
@af:if({ExistingRemain} = 'no')
If you have the details for the new tenants, please enter them here:
@endaf:if
How many new tenants will be moving in? {NumNT}
@af:if({ExistingRemain} != 'no')
How many existing tenants will be remaining at the property? {NumET}
@endaf:if
New/Existing Tenants
Title First name Surname
@af:repeat({newTenants})
{newTenants/title} {newTenants/firstName} {newTenants/surname}
@endaf:repeat
@af:if({NumNT} != 0)
Please provide start date for new tenancies: {newTenancyStart}
Please provide move in Date {MoveInDate}
@endaf:if
@af:if({movingFrom} = '')
Move From Address
Moving from {#MovFromAdd/addressTextArea}
@endaf:if
@endaf:if
"}
